channel.title: Encounter on RebuildEQ
channel.description: Recent content in Encounter on RebuildEQ

item.title: Encounter Cooldown Tweaks
item.description:
• When you create alts, encounters no longer are eligible until at least 24 hours.
  • Harmony is no longer flagged as beneficial, meaning it should work as intended.
  • Shaman’s Invis, Haste, and Slow spells are now available. The next time you level up you should get any previously missing spells.
  • Elunium now drops off 55+ mobs. Keep this rare item for future armor upgrades.
  • Druid offense line is now in.

item.title: Daily Login Reward Added
item.description:
• Fixed a typo with Boastful Bellow in game
  • #builds now shows the reset reminder in chat at all levels it’s eligible (for testing, that’s all levels)
  • Repaired some issues with #rez.
  • Added daily login reward.
  • Added /who system to include Identity.
  • Box open announcements are now itemlinks.

item.title: Encounters Easier 20 And Below
item.description:
• Fixed an issue with #encounter claiming where some times you didn’t get a reward.
  • Madmen no longer spawn in encounters in in EC.
  • Another pass of removing the pesky defiant drops was done.
  • Encounters are easier now for levels 11-20 (half hp of before).
